ingredients.item: 500g skinless boneless British chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces

instructions.step: Toss the chicken with the cajun seasoning and ¼ tsp celery salt. Fry the bacon in a pan over a high heat until crisp – about 5 minutes; drain on kitchen paper. Discard the fat from the pan, add 1 tbsp oil and brown the chicken. Lift out of the pan; set aside.

Add the onion, pepper, celery and chilli flakes to the pan with the remaining ½ tbsp oil and ¼ tsp celery salt; sauté until soft – about 5 minutes. Add the tomatoes and rice; cook for 1 minute. Pour in the stock and 100ml water, return the chicken and bacon to the pan and cover. Turn the heat to low and cook for 25-30 minutes. Serve scattered with parsley, if liked.
